text:
It would be good to add an option to the neurovault fetcher so that images are resampled right after downloading, and stored only in resampled format. 

This would be useful to save space when downloading large collections. 

Ran into this issue when considering building an example (see #1506) using a large Neurovault collection (for example collection 503)

@jeromedockes
